name: Totalmovie
overview:
Totalmovie.com is Latin America’s first legal premium video online streaming service. Launched in July 2011, Totalmovie.com now operates in 40 countries across Latin America, and has quickly become the second largest online video service in the region. Totalmovie is operated by Total Media Networks SA.

In addition to Totalmovie.com, a direct-to-consumer service, Total Media Networks SA offers its service to consumers through its wholesale distribution partners around the globe. These partners include mobile phone operators, PayTV firms and Internet service providers.

Total Media Networks SA aims to become the world’s first global “cable” video service that will provide personalized premium entertainment to consumers seamlessly across every connected screen in today’s converged digital world. Total Media Networks will achieve its goal through its patent-pending technology platform, aggregation of quality premium content, and its management team that includes executives with successful track record with Fortune 100 media firms and cutting-edge startups.

Total Media Networks SA is headquartered in Montevideo, Uruguay, with corporate offices located in San Jose, California, Mexico City, Mexico and Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Total Media Networks is owned by Grupo Salinas, whose interests in media, Internet, telecommunications, retail and financial services generate around $6B in annual revenue across Latin America & U.S.

relationships.title: Chief Strategy Officer & EVP, Business Development
